attributes.action: Recognition on behalf of the British people by PM Gordon Brown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To honour Heather Brooke, journalist, by way of a medal of courage, for her tenacity, integrity and outstanding courage for services rendered on behalf of the British people, for which the British public will be forever grateful.... so thank us God

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
